text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
—— Hey y'all! Kris S, Gimlet! Our pals are hollerin' for us! 
Let's cut a rug over there, come on!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
… Our friends, huh? I might've underestimated their 
capabilities a bit… No, maybe I just couldn't see it.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: What's going on?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Truth be told, I thought you all were merely Galateas. 
Simply following the plotline in my script.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
But the story we all spun, that moment brimming with 
ecstasy… Even the fanciest alcohol one can brew can't 
replicate that vibe.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
—— It's a farewell, but it's one we need 
to move toward the future…… Your very 
essence breathed life into the narrative.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
I'd like to raise a glass once more. To creating 
"memories" together… with our comrades.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …… Count me in.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I'm proud. Of what I accomplished during 
this… All Hooves' Festival, I'm proud.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's chuck them feelings into a good ol' dance —— 
Hm? By the way, where're Fine and Shakur?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …… It's over.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
It was a genuinely splendid affair… Sharing the stage with 
my dear Tap's associates, engaging in rigorous rehearsals 
with Kris and friends, partaking in merriment……

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
… To think I was standing here just a moment ago. 
It was fun… truly. That's why I believe……

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ……! …Shakur? You haven't changed yet?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh… do you also find it hard to part from the stage?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
… I want to thank you. You are so very kind-hearted. 
You've been of immense assistance in creating these 
precious memories.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to you, it has transformed into a truly…… 
a truly unforgettable memory. I hope you feel the same.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …… Shakur?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Shall I banish you to the depths of hell?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
If you wish, I can carry you to an eternal realm. 
A world with no goodbyes. ……Wish for it, Fine.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Hmph. Idiot, I was just messing with you. Don't take it seriously.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …… I did not take it seriously.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Whatever. My hypothesis has already been proven.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: With this, the whole "memory-making" shenanigans are finally over. Haah… I'm tired.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Shakur, what are you ——

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: You're annoying.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …… Excuse me?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
The material you brought me that day. ……It was 
disgustingly perfect. You didn't need my help, you just 
wanted me to be part of it.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
"Indeed, partings are inevitable. However, 
for the journey ahead… I believe memories 
like these will keep us connected forever."

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Memories, memories, memories… 
―― I hate it.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
So, I came up with a hypothesis. What if I transformed 
them into something beyond your wildest expectations? 
Leaving you with only regrets, a lingering trauma.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
…… It was genuinely the most spectacular memory I've 
ever experienced. It's impossible… to turn it into trauma.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Though you are well aware of this. 
You still had fun…… didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: I guess.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …… You're such an idiot.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Well, go ahead and act tough all you want. 
You're gonna regret everything.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: From the moment you called me a friend.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …… I won't regret it. I will never.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I will continue leaving behind memories… for the future 
and in fulfilment of my duty. For when that day comes, 
as it surely will, when we must part ways ——

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
"Farewell"… Indeed, the stage hath reached its final bow. 
―― Yet!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
I shall not let it conclude. I shall render it everlasting, 
the narrative… the time spent with my fellow companions!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
For the players yet tread the boards, and the audience abides. 
Verily, 'tis but an "intermission" we find ourselves in… 
Let us prepare for the next scene.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
—— Still and yet, we shall accumulate more recollections! 
With neither script nor narrative, let our unbridled tale… 
commence!
